0: AN ACT FURTHER AUTHORIZING THE CITY OR MUNICIPAL CIVIL REGISTRAR OR THE CONSUL GENERAL TO CORRECT CLERICAL OR TYPHOGRAPHICAL ERRORS IN THE MIDDLE NAME OR SURNAME OF A PERSON APPEARING IN THE CIVIL REGISTER WITHOUT NEED OF A JUDICIAL ORDER, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NUMBERED NINETY FORTY-EIGHT, AS AMENDED, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
